3797562.title: [Feature] Add Ring to Environment Mapping for Cosmic
3797562.description:
This PR introduces a new feature to add Ring to environment mapping for Cosmic.

Key Features:
- Implements ring-based environment segmentation for better deployment control.
- Enhances support for dynamic environment configuration.
- Allows gradual rollouts to specific environment rings.

Expected Impact:
- Improves deployment safety by enabling phased rollouts.
- Enhances observability for staged environment testing.
- Reduces risk by isolating updates to specific rings.

Testing:
- Verified mapping logic in staging environments.
- Conducted regression tests to ensure backward compatibility.
- Collected feedback from internal users for iteration.

3802485.title: [Bug Fix] Debug Schema Service Issues in Dev Fabric
3802485.description:
This PR addresses critical issues in the schema service within the Dev Fabric environment.

Key Fixes:
- Resolves incorrect schema validation errors.
- Fixes intermittent connection failures to the schema registry.
- Enhances logging for better debugging and monitoring.

Expected Impact:
- Ensures reliable schema validation in Dev Fabric.
- Improves developer productivity by reducing debugging overhead.
- Enhances service stability with better error handling.

Testing:
- Unit tests updated to cover edge cases in schema validation.
- Integration tests run successfully in the Dev Fabric environment.
- Logs reviewed to confirm error resolution.

3806892.title: [Improvement] Enhance OSI Health Management System
3806892.description:
This PR improves the OSI health management system with better monitoring and alerting capabilities.

Key Enhancements:
- Refactors the health check service to include real-time analytics.
- Adds integration with Azure Monitor and Log Analytics.
- Implements self-healing mechanisms for common service failures.

Expected Impact:
- Provides better visibility into service health.
- Reduces downtime through proactive issue detection.
- Improves system resilience with auto-recovery mechanisms.

Testing:
- Validated monitoring data in staging environments.
- Performed chaos testing to verify self-healing workflows.
- Collected feedback from ops team for further refinements.
